title: Slope
text: From those two points, there is a rise of $$3$$ units and a run of $$1$$ unit; therefore $$m=\frac{3}{1}=3$$.

title: y-intercept
text: Find the y-intercept of the line.

title: y-intercept
text: When $$x=0$$, $$y=-5$$. Therefore, the y-intercept is the point $$(0,-5)$$

title: Slope and y-intercept
text: The slope is $$m=3$$ and the y-intercept is $$(0,-5)$$.
